attributes.action: Planning for road at Trent St to service new proposed car park for TG Holdcrofts
attributes.additional_details:
TG Holdcroft propose to turn the cul de sac (Trent St) at the rear of 2-12 Dividy Road into an access road for a new car storage park they want to build behind the ones they have already built on Leek Road. They are slowly destroying all of the fields and wildlife haven and if the access road goes through it will then only be a matter of time before all of the open spaces are car parking for them.
The area is home to bats, kingfishers, heron, pheasant, newts, barn owls, frogs and toads, another bit of wildlife cast aside!
